trans-unit.target:
Queen Mary 2 — the longest passenger ocean linerin the world.
It's length is 345 m.
Freedom of the Seas — the biggest cruise ship by tonnage — 154 704 GRT and passenger capacity — 4370 people.
«Vandal» — russian oil tanker. It is the first motor ship builded in 1903.

The Wartsila RTA96C turbocharged two-stroke diesel engine is most powerfull engine in the world.
Power — 108920 h.p.

The most expensive yacht
in the world — «Eclipse»,
it costs $1.1 billion.
The owner of the yacht — russian billionaire Roman Abramovich.
«Miss GEICO» — the fastest missile boat in the world. It can reach speeds exceeding 320 km /hour. The capacity of each of the two turbine boats — 2100 hp

Swiss vessel «Turanor PlanetSolar» uses only solar energy from 537 sq. m of photovoltaic panels.
Its length — 30 meters, beam — 15 meters and can accommodate up to 50 passengers.
Swedish supertanker «Nanny» — the widest cargo ship in the world. Length — 364 m, beam — 79 m, speed — 16 knots, crew — 36 people.
